query: SELECT * FROM snowflake.db.users WHERE active = true
INSERT INTO snowflake.db.user_activity SELECT user_id, 'login' as action, NOW() as timestamp FROM snowflake.db.users WHERE last_login > '2021-01-01'
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_users FROM snowflake.db.users
UPDATE snowflake.db.users SET last_seen = NOW() WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM snowflake.db.user_activity WHERE action = 'login')
SELECT u.user_id, u.email, COUNT(a.action) as activity_count FROM snowflake.db.users u LEFT JOIN snowflake.db.user_activity a ON u.user_id = a.user_id GROUP BY u.user_id, u.email
